name: Add a new row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from a new Cliengo client
description:
This template periodically retrieves new clients from Cliengo and adds them as new rows to a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

A sample spreadsheet is [here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vv4k93JjEg1CdxyWae2dvpYhXf4u-A6ThVaEtjpLGVg/edit#gid=0) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change this after you set up the template.
